official_title: A bill to provide that the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers shall not have certain permitting authority with respect to Lake Pend Oreille, Idaho.

summary.text: Denies certain permitting authority to the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers concerning the Lake Pend Oreille, Idaho, public works project.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers shall not have certain permitting authority with respect to Lake Pend Oreille, Idaho.
